name: Sleigh Strikers
description:
In Sleigh Strikers Santa's elves have engineered the ultimate gift-giving gadget: the Present Launcher 1225. With the reindeer missing, it's up to you to deliver the goods in a blitz of festive fury. Race through 10 increasingly challenging levels, each faster and more frantic than the last, and bring back the missing reindeer to save Christmas. Ready, aim, unwrap!
Challenge the rest of the world at your present delivering skills and deliver your way to the top of the Global Leaderboards.


Ready to Sleigh? the frosty fun ramps up with each level. Your mission: zip presents or coal down chimneys, scoring points for precision. But beware, a merry mix-up between the naughty and nice lists will cost you! Aim like an elf on expresso to snag those high scores and stars. While it's all jingle bells and joy to start, mastering the leaderboard is a craft only the most dedicated Santa's helpers will perfect.
